full_summary:
# Conifer Seedlings - Request for Proposal

## Tender Details
** Tender Number ** : PW-KIN-685-8723
** Solicitation Number ** : 23240-230425/A
** Closing Date and Time ** : January 9, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
** Date of Publication ** : December 20, 2022

## Description of Requirements
The Public Works and Government Services Canada invites bidders to submit proposals for the production of conifer seedlings for a planned summer tree plantation at the Petawawa Research Forest, Chalk River, Ontario.

** Key Requirements **

* 243,828 conifer seedlings to be delivered in the late summer of 2023
* 160,128 seedlings for the Adaptive Silviculture for Climate Change (ASCC) Research project, including 1,500 TRANSX seedlings
* 83,700 seedlings for the Petawawa Research Forest
* White pine seeds to be stratified for 90 days prior to sowing
* Delivery date subject to change

## Procurement Method and Criteria
This is a Competitive - Open Bidding procurement process, where all interested suppliers may submit a bid. The selection criterion is Lowest Price.

## Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Mary Lou Harrington
Phone: (613) 314-1953
Fax: (613) 545-8067
Email: [marylou.harrington@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:marylou.harrington@pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Documents
Interested bidders may download the solicitation document from the Canada Buys website:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/19/2b6ea9cb5b94dcc43f15059133486359/ABES.PROD.PW_KIN.B685.E8723.EBSU000.PDF

## Important Information
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

Please note that this information is subject to change and interested bidders are advised to regularly check the Canada Buys website for any updates.  // End of Rewritten Entry
